sentence.Network_en: Susan and Deborah share an intensely selfish, egotistic streak.

sentence.Network_en: As he began to earn more and more money, his personality became more and more egotistic.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的钱越赚越多时, 他的个性也变得越来越自负.

entry.tran: 利己主义的;自私自利的;以自我为中心的
entry.def: Someone who is egotistic or egotistical behaves selfishly and thinks they are more important than other people.

example.ex: Susan and Deborah share an intensely selfish, egotistic streak.
example.tran: 苏珊和德博拉两个人都极端自私和自我。

means.word_mean: 1. characteristic of those having an inflated idea of their own importance
2. characteristic of false pride; having an exaggerated sense of self-importance;
